items.input: Firm: Revelstoke Capital, Company: Evolve Med Spa

conversationHistory.content:
Find headquarters location for the portfolio company. Use perplexity_search to find city, state, and full address. Return JSON: {company_name, firm_name, headquarters_location: {city, state, full_address, research_confidence}}. Include no comments in your response.

Inputs:
input: Firm: Revelstoke Capital, Company: Evolve Med Spa

content.text: Let me search for Evolve Med Spa's headquarters location.

input.query: Evolve Med Spa headquarters location address Revelstoke Capital portfolio company

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa’s headquarters is in Hoboken, New Jersey; third‑party business directories list the corporate office at 706 Grand St, Hoboken, NJ 07030, USA, with Hoboken identified as the company’s headquarters city.[1][2]  

- ZoomInfo lists the “corporate office” address as **706 Grand St, Hoboken, NJ 07030**.[1]  
- Lusha identifies the company’s headquarters city as **Hoboken, New Jersey**.[2]  
- Note: Evolve Med Spa also operates a Hoboken clinic at 1025 Maxwell Lane; this appears to be a patient‑facing location rather than the corporate office.[5]

Regarding Revelstoke Capital: Evolve Med Spa does not appear on Revelstoke Capital Partners’ featured portfolio listings; Revelstoke’s site highlights other healthcare investments, but does not list Evolve Med Spa among them.[4] If you need confirmation of any investment relationship, I can search SEC filings or press releases.

Sources:
1. https://www.zoominfo.com/pic/evolve-med-spa/529980418
2. https://www.lusha.com/business/48091faf4fc23f0b/
3. https://www.bbb.org/us/nj/montclair/profile/medical-spa/evolve-med-spa-0221-90211031
4. https://www.revelstokecapital.com
5. https://evolvemedspa.com/in/new-jersey/hoboken-nj/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

input.query: Evolve Med Spa Revelstoke Capital ownership acquisition current status

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa was acquired by a private equity group in April 2024; Viper Partners served as the exclusive sell-side advisor on the transaction.[1][3] The buyer was not named in the announcement, and neither Viper Partners’ release nor secondary coverage identifies the acquirer.[1][3]

Key details
- Transaction: Acquisition of Evolve Med Spa by an unnamed private equity firm.[1][3]
- Announcement date: April 5, 2024.[1][3]
- Advisor: Viper Partners (sell-side).[1][3]
- Company profile: Evolve Med Spa operates a multi-location med spa platform with a strong Northeast U.S. presence and is described as one of the largest branded med spas in the U.S., led by Jeffery Mandler.[1][3]

About Revelstoke Capital
- Revelstoke Capital Partners is an active healthcare-focused private equity firm, but its publicly listed portfolio does not show Evolve Med Spa among current investments as of its portfolio page update; Evolve is not mentioned there.[4][5] This suggests Revelstoke is not the disclosed acquirer of Evolve Med Spa, at least based on publicly available portfolio disclosures.[4][5]

Current status and what’s unknown
- Confirmed: Evolve Med Spa is PE-owned following the April 2024 acquisition.[1][3]
- Unknown from public releases: The acquiring firm’s identity, deal value, and ownership structure were not disclosed.[1][3]
- Not indicated on Revelstoke’s site: Any ownership of Evolve Med Spa.[4][5]

If you want, I can search state filings, lender presentations, or local news for any later disclosures naming the buyer or confirming whether Revelstoke had involvement post-close.

Sources:
1. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emerging-trends-in-the-med-spa-industry-viper-partners-insightful-advisory-on-evolve-med-spa-transition-302108307.html
2. https://pestakeholder.org/news/private-equity-health-care-acquisitions-october-2023/
3. https://healthcaredealflow.com/evolve-med-spa-acquired-by-pe-firm/
4. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/
5. https://www.revelstokecapital.com


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

input.query: Evolve Med Spa Revelstoke Capital acquisition history before 2024

content.content:
{
  "content": [
    {
      "type": "text",
      "text": "Evolve Med Spa’s acquisition by a private equity group was announced in April 2024; publicly available deal coverage does not identify any prior acquisitions of Evolve Med Spa by Revelstoke Capital (or any other PE sponsor) before 2024.[1][3] 

Essential context:
- PR Newswire and secondary deal trackers report that Viper Partners acted as the exclusive sell-side advisor for the acquisition of Evolve Med Spa by “a private equity group,” announced April 5, 2024; neither source names the buyer, nor do they reference any earlier ownership by Revelstoke.[1][3] 
- Revelstoke Capital’s own portfolio listings and news archive do not show Evolve Med Spa among investments around or before 2024, and contain no press item indicating a pre‑2024 Evolve transaction.[5][4] 

What this means:
- If your query is whether Evolve Med Spa had any Revelstoke Capital acquisition history before 2024, available sources indicate no such transaction is documented; the buyer in 2024 was not named in those releases, and Revelstoke does not claim Evolve as a portfolio company prior to 2024.[1][3][5] 

Notes on gaps:
- Because the April 2024 announcement did not disclose the buyer, there could be nondisclosed sponsor involvement; however, no credible public record ties Revelstoke to Evolve Med Spa before 2024.[1][3] If you need confirmation, checking state filings, lender/UCC records, or Evolve’s press/newsroom pages could clarify beneficial ownership changes not covered by press aggregators.

Sources:
1. https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/emerging-trends-in-the-med-spa-industry-viper-partners-insightful-advisory-on-evolve-med-spa-transition-302108307.html
2. https://media.mcguirewoods.com/publications/2023/Private-Equity-in-Healthcare.pdf
3. https://healthcaredealflow.com/evolve-med-spa-acquired-by-pe-firm/
4. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/news/revelstoke-capital-partners-recognized-on-inc-s-2024-list-of-founder-friendly-investors/
5. https://www.revelstokecapital.com/investments/


(Results from Perplexity sonar-pro)"
    }
  ],
  "isError": false
}

Include no comments in your response.

conversationHistory.content:
Test Form 5500 matches using form5500_name_test. Only proceed if status: 'LEGAL_ENTITY_FOUND' or 'LEGAL_ENTITY_UNCLEAR'. Search order: 1) Legal entity name from previous task 2) Original company name 3) Shortened versions (remove suffixes) 4) Common variations. Inclusive search returns broader results, so start broad. Return JSON: {company_name, firm_name, headquarters_location, portfolio_verification, employee_count_assessment, legal_entity_research, form5500_match: {legal_name, ein, location, match_type, record_count, variation_used}, status: 'READY_FOR_EXTRACTION' or 'NEEDS_ADVANCED_RESOLUTION'}. Include no comments in your response.

Inputs:
legal_entity_research: Since the input shows the company is not an active portfolio company with a status of "LIKELY_NO_FORM_5500", I cannot proceed with the legal entity search as the status condition "PROCEED_TO_FORM_5500" is not met. The workflow should stop here based on the provided logic.
